title: U.S. 'horrified' by Myanmar violence, Blinken says after bloodiest day since military coup
content:
1. U.S. 'horrified' by Myanmar violence, Blinken says after bloodiest day since military coup  NBC News
  2. UN officials condemn Myanmar junta after 100-plus civilians killed in one day  CNN
  3. International Chiefs of Defense Condemn Use of Lethal Force in Burma  Department of Defense
  4. Global condemnation of Myanmar military's 'reign of terror' after deadliest day since coup  FRANCE 24 English
  5. Myanmar protests continue a day after more than 100 killed  Taiwan News
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: 布林肯在经历了军事政变以来最血腥的一天后表示，美国对缅甸的暴力事件感到 "震惊"。
布林肯在經歷了軍事政變以來最血腥的一天後表示，美國對緬甸的暴力事件感到 "震驚"。
